# jans_feature_flags (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving Janssen Auth Server feature flags.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `flags` (List of String) List of feature flags enabled in the Janssen Auth Server.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
